name: Granite Fissure: First Shard
description: Granite ridge split; bone-iron shard glints in fissure. Naia wedges compass, Maliya chants with clove and salt, Kassim pries shard with dagger. Nine fruit bats wheel above; seven chalk tallies at crack. Riddle: When stone remembers, wings agree.
prompt: Etched parchment engraved map-card, muted sepia + indigo + teal + faint gold highlights. Ritual haunting atmosphere, layered symbolic composition. Granite ridge split; bone-iron shard glints in fissure. Naia wedges compass, Maliya chants with clove and salt, Kassim pries shard with dagger. Nine fruit bats wheel above; seven chalk tallies at crack.. Key props numeric: 1 shard, 7 tallies, 9 bats. Cipher letter: V Bearing: 160°. Intricate line engraving, subtle volumetric mist, painterly etched hybrid
